comments:
Create a new Remote Java App entry under Debug Run Configuration.

Go to the Source Tab and clear all default entries.
Select Add ... to add Java Projects
Select Java Project ( a dialog box with a list of project comes up )
Select multiple projects and hit ok
The dialog is dismissed , the Select Java Project dialog remains (instead of being dismissed)

Not projects are added in the Source Tab:

Fixed in SourceContainerViewer. New entries should be added at the end when there is no selection. Loop incorrectly used loop counter as insertion index. However, if there are dups, this could be incorrect.
